readingMnemonic: The <kanji>reef</kanji> is the <reading>Shou</reading>gun's (しょう) favorite place to be nowadays. He sits next to the water, and stares down into it for hours.
meaningMnemonic: The <radical>stone</radical> that looks like a <radical>turkey</radical> <radical>boil</radical>ing underwater is just a <kanji>reef</kanji>.
